attributes.action: Reform the law on agrochemical use to uphold citizens'  rights to breathe clean air and animals' rights to live uncontaminated by chemicals.
attributes.additional_details: To reform the law to reflect citizens' rights to breathe uncontaminated air and grow plants, raise animals or enjoy their land without fear of contamination from neighbouring agrochemical applications; and the rights of animals and plants to live without having their environment contaminated. To prevent the use of agrochemicals to control weeds fungal growth and insects where there can be shown to be a better way.. To rewrite the law to promote fair and beneficial stewardship of land air and water and biodiversity.
